result.reason: Current CSV import implementation relies on semicolon delimiters, which fails on standard comma-separated CSV files commonly exported by other tools.
result.approach: Modify CsvConnectionsDeserializerMremotengFormat.cs to automatically detect the delimiter (comma or semicolon) from the header row before parsing.
